languages.text: "Я могу поклясться, что видела однажды такую зверушку, когда пролетала над нижними секторами столицы. Должно быть, эти ксеносы водились здесь еще до людей и не были до конца истреблены".

traits.locale_text: [Draft] Никогда не видел ничего подобного, и такие твари действительно населяют нашу систему?

languages.text: "I could swear I once saw a creature just like this one when I was flying over the capital's lower sectors. These xenos must have lived here before us and were never fully exterminated."
languages.original_text: "Я могу поклясться, что видела однажды такую зверушку, когда пролетала над нижними секторами столицы. Должно быть, эти ксеносы водились здесь еще до людей и не были до конца истреблены".

traits.locale_text: "I could swear I once saw a creature just like this one when I was flying over the capital's lower sectors. These xenos must have lived here before us and were never fully exterminated."
"I could swear I once saw a creature just like this one when I was flying over the capital's lower sectors. These xenos must have lived here before us and were never fully exterminated."
"I could swear I once saw a creature just like this one when I was flying over the capital's lower sectors. These xenos must have lived here before us and were never fully exterminated."
"I could swear I once saw a creature just like this one when I was flying over the capital's lower sectors. These xenos must have lived here before us and were never fully exterminated."
"I could swear I once saw a creature just like this one when I was flying over the capital's lower sectors. These xenos must have lived here before us and were never fully exterminated."

languages.text: “我敢发誓，我之前在首都的下层地区飞行时，曾见过一只和这一模一样的生物。这群异形肯定是在我们来这里之前，就一直生活在这里，而且它们从来没被彻底灭绝过。”
languages.original_text: "I could swear I once saw a creature just like this one when I was flying over the capital's lower sectors. These xenos must have lived here before us and were never fully exterminated."

traits.locale_text: “我敢发誓，我之前在首都的下层地区飞行时，曾见过一只和这一模一样的生物。这群异形肯定是在我们来这里之前，就一直生活在这里，而且它们从来没被彻底灭绝过。”

languages.text: «Juraría que vi una criatura como esta cuando sobrevolaba los sectores inferiores de la capital. Estos xenos debían de estar aquí antes de que llegáramos y no terminamos de erradicarlos».
languages.original_text: "I could swear I once saw a creature just like this one when I was flying over the capital's lower sectors. These xenos must have lived here before us and were never fully exterminated."

traits.locale_text: «Juraría que vi una criatura como esta cuando sobrevolaba los sectores inferiores de la capital. Estos xenos debían de estar aquí antes de que llegáramos y no terminamos de erradicarlos».

languages.text: 「昔、首都の下層星域を飛んでいたときに、これとまったく同じ生き物を見たことがある。こういった異種族は、俺達よりも前からここに住んでいて、密かに生き延びていたんだろう」
languages.original_text: "I could swear I once saw a creature just like this one when I was flying over the capital's lower sectors. These xenos must have lived here before us and were never fully exterminated."

traits.locale_text: 「昔、首都の下層星域を飛んでいたときに、これとまったく同じ生き物を見たことがある。こういった異種族は、俺達よりも前からここに住んでいて、密かに生き延びていたんだろう」

languages.text: "Ich möchte schwören, ich habe exakt so eine Kreatur schon mal bei einem Flug über die unteren Sektoren der Hauptstadt gesehen. Diese Xenos müssen lange vor uns hier gelebt haben und wurden nie vollständig ausgerottet."
languages.original_text: "I could swear I once saw a creature just like this one when I was flying over the capital's lower sectors. These xenos must have lived here before us and were never fully exterminated."

traits.locale_text: "Ich möchte schwören, ich habe exakt so eine Kreatur schon mal bei einem Flug über die unteren Sektoren der Hauptstadt gesehen. Diese Xenos müssen lange vor uns hier gelebt haben und wurden nie vollständig ausgerottet."

languages.text: « Je jurerais avoir aperçu une créature semblable en survolant les secteurs inférieurs de la ville. Ces xénos devaient vivre ici avant notre arrivée et n'ont jamais été totalement exterminés. »
languages.original_text: "I could swear I once saw a creature just like this one when I was flying over the capital's lower sectors. These xenos must have lived here before us and were never fully exterminated."

traits.locale_text: « Je jurerais avoir aperçu une créature semblable en survolant les secteurs inférieurs de la ville. Ces xénos devaient vivre ici avant notre arrivée et n'ont jamais été totalement exterminés. »

languages.text: "Bir keresinde başkentin aşağı sektörlerinin üzerinden uçarken buna benzer bir yaratık gördüğüme yemin edebilirim. Bu zenolar burada bizden önce yaşamış ve soyları tamamen kurutulamamış olmalı."
languages.original_text: "I could swear I once saw a creature just like this one when I was flying over the capital's lower sectors. These xenos must have lived here before us and were never fully exterminated."

traits.locale_text: "Bir keresinde başkentin aşağı sektörlerinin üzerinden uçarken buna benzer bir yaratık gördüğüme yemin edebilirim. Bu zenolar burada bizden önce yaşamış ve soyları tamamen kurutulamamış olmalı."
